name: Bloom Queen
description:
Controls

WASD to move, Mouse to aim, left click to shoot

Description

Help the Queen Bee to bring back Spring!
Shoot the trees and the flowers to pollinate them and obtain the globes to prevent the Queen from dying.

Development The game was developed in around 3 days using the Godot engine. After trying to polish it as much as possible with the time that we had, we feel that the game lacks something, but we couldn't really find out what. Credits
  • Design: me and my sister
  • Queen's Sprite: my sister
  • Background: created by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz), found on OpenGameArt
  • Font: Shin Akiba Punx
  • Code, sounds and the rest of the sprite: me
